overview: Anders brings experience of the IT and telecom sectors from the late eighties onward, having held executive positions at Scribona, Allgon, and Nokia. He has extensive experience leading and developing technology companies. Anders was the CEO of Operax prior to his engagement with Netadmin Systems, and worked as the CEO of Envox EMEA before that. He holds an MSc in Industrial Engineering and Management at the Institute of Technology at LinkÃ¶ping University.
